description:
Last night three friends who have just taken a cooking class held a dinner to practice their new skills. Can you identify which person brought which main course, and the dessert they each made for the evening?
The permissible items are: 
Main Dish: ['Gado Gado', 'Beef Wellington', 'Shrimp Ceviche']
Dessert: ['Creme Brulee', 'French Apple Cake', 'Raspberry Tiramisu']
Name: ['Creme Brulee', 'Tobias']

clues.text: The three people are Tobias, the one who brought the Gado Gado, and the one who brought the Raspberry Tiramisu.
Fiona did not bring the Beef Wellington.
The Shrimp Ceviche was brought by either Tobias or the person who brought the Creme Brulee.
